NK037(ji)015:1: // ye shes kyi ma mo e ka dz+aa ti sde
NK037(ji)015:2: bdun nam sde lnga 'khor bcas kyi sgrub thabs dbang
NK037(ji)015:5: rgyal kun skyed mdzad kun bzang yum //
NK037(ji)015:6: ye shes ma mo'i tshul bzung nas //
NK037(ji)015:7: gsang sngags bstan pa skyong mdzad ma //
NK037(ji)015:8: de la btud nas sgrub thabs bshad //
NK037(ji)015:9: 'dir ye shes kyi ma mo e ka dz+aa ti
NK037(ji)015:10: sde bdud nam sde lnga 'khor dang bcas pa'i sgrub
NK037(ji)015:11: thabs dang 'brel bar dbang bskur ba la gsum ste
NK037(ji)015:12: / sbyor ba yo byad kyi gshom /
NK037(ji)015:13: dngos gzhi sgrub pa'i thabs dang /
NK037(ji)015:15: dang po yo byad bsham pa ni /
NK037(ji)015:16: stegs bu gru bzhi la brub khung gru gsum bsnol ma /
NK037(ji)015:17: de'i dbus su 'bru nag gi tshom bu bdun bzhugs tshul dang mthun par bkod /
NK037(ji)015:18: de'i lte bar many+dzi la sngags srung ma'i bshos bu
NK037(ji)015:19: dpal gtor 'khor rang 'dra bzhi dang pad 'dab bzhis
NK037(ji)015:20: bskor ba / shar du srog sgrub mar gru gsum rang 'dra gsum gyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)015:21: lhor drang srong la gru gsum g.yas dkyus rang 'dra brgyad kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)015:22: nub tu gnod sbyin la gru gsum tel pas mtshan pa gru gsum brgyad kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)015:23: byang du dam can la gru bzhi mkhar thabs kyi
NK037(ji)015:24: khar gru gsum ra mgos mtshan pa bshos phran brgyad
NK037(ji)015:25: kyis bskor ba / byang shar du legs ldan la
NK037(ji)015:26: gru gsum dmar nag 'khor rang 'dra drug gis bskor
NK037(ji)015:27: kyis bskor ba / ba / re ma t+ai gru gsum bshos phran bzhis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)015:28: de thams cad la sha khrag gtso bor gyur pa'i kha zas bzang po sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
NK037(ji)015:29: rang mdog dang mtshungs pa'i mda' dar sku rten dang bcas pa btsugs /
NK037(ji)015:30: de dag gi shar du mchod gtor gtso 'khor spyi spungs su byas pa dang /
NK037(ji)015:32: lhor bshos bu ri rab bang rim bzhi pa'i steng
NK037(ji)015:33: gi dbus dang phyogs bzhir mar me lnga bzhag pa
NK037(ji)015:34: / nub tu rten rdzas dang bcas pa'i mda' dar /
NK037(ji)015:35: byang du b+han+d+ha dam rdzas kyis bkang ba rnams dang /
NK037(ji)015:45: mchod pa sna tshogs pas mtha' bskor ba sogs mthong brgyud bzhin tshogs par bya'o //
NK037(ji)015:47: bdag bskyed yi dam zhi khro gang yang rung ba'i
NK037(ji)015:48: rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas mchod gtor rnams byin
NK037(ji)015:49: gyis brlab / mdun gyi rten bsang sbyang /
NK037(ji)015:50: stong pa'i ngang las mdun gyi nam mkhar dur khrod
NK037(ji)015:51: chen po'i dbus su yam las bskal pa'i me rlung
NK037(ji)015:52: dmar nag 'bar zhing 'tshubs pa'i klong du ram las
NK037(ji)015:53: rak+ta'i rgya mtsho rba klong 'khrugs pa /
NK037(ji)015:54: kem las rus pa'i ri rab 'dzings stabs su brtsegs
NK037(ji)015:55: pa'i steng du b+h+rum las b+hany+dza 'bar ba'i gzhal yas
NK037(ji)015:56: khang rgya khyon tshad med pa 'jigs shing rngams pa'i
NK037(ji)015:57: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i dbus su pad+ma dang
NK037(ji)015:58: nyi ma dgra bgegs kyi gdan la trag yig smug
NK037(ji)015:59: nag yongs su gyur pa las /
NK037(ji)015:60: dpal ye shes kyi ma mo sngags kyi srung ma
NK037(ji)015:61: sku mdog smug nag dud sprin 'khrigs pa lta bu
NK037(ji)015:62: zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa khro gtum mi bzad pa'i
NK037(ji)015:63: gzugs can / dpral ba'i dbyings na ye shes kyi spyan gcig dmar zlum gzir zhing lta ba /
NK037(ji)015:64: zhal rab tu gdangs shing zla tshes lta bu'i mche ba gcig mthur du gtsigs pa /
NK037(ji)015:65: ljags 'dril zhing h'u dang b+h+yo'i nga ro drag por sgrog pa /
NK037(ji)015:66: ral pa kham nag thur du grol ba'i dbus na
NK037(ji)015:67: lcags kyi ral pa nyag gcig gyen du gzings pa
NK037(ji)015:68: / thugs ka na bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'dzag pa'i nu ma gcig 'phyang ba /
NK037(ji)015:69: phyag g.yas zhing gi dbyug pa klad la phyar zhing /
NK037(ji)015:70: g.yon dgra snying dang lcags spyang khra stabs su 'gyed pa /
NK037(ji)015:71: thod pa skam po'i cod pan dang do shal can /
NK037(ji)015:72: mi lpags kyi g.yang gzhi dang 'ja' sprin gyis stod
NK037(ji)015:73: g.yogs shing stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs 'phyang ba
NK037(ji)015:74: / phyag rgya lngas brgyan te g.yon brkyang ba'i gar stabs kyis ro'i stan la rol pa /
NK037(ji)015:75: 'khor sprul pa'i ma mo rnam gsum /
NK037(ji)015:76: sbyor sgrol srog gcod kyi ging gsum /
NK037(ji)015:77: ye shes kyi ma mo lnga /
NK037(ji)015:79: sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad sogs snang srid ma
NK037(ji)015:80: mo'i 'khor tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pas bskor ba
NK037(ji)015:81: / ma mo'i g.yon zur byang shar du bdud mgon
NK037(ji)015:82: legs ldan nag po dus mtha'i sprin ltar gnag pa
NK037(ji)015:83: zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa /
NK037(ji)015:84: phyag g.yas gnyis gri gug dang dug sdong /
NK037(ji)015:85: g.yon gnyis thod khrag dang bdud zhags 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)015:86: dar nag gi 'jol ber sum brtsegs gsol zhing /
NK037(ji)015:87: thod skam gyi dbu rgyan dang rlon pa'i do shal 'phyang ba /
NK037(ji)015:88: bdud rta nag po chibs shing rngams brjid drag shul
NK037(ji)015:89: che ba lha dmag bye ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa
NK037(ji)015:90: / de'i g.yon du dpal ldan lha mo re ma
NK037(ji)015:91: t+ai sku mdog sngo nag skem zhig rid pa zhal
NK037(ji)015:93: g.yas ral gri dang g.yon nad rkyal 'dzin pa ma
NK037(ji)015:94: mo'i chas can drel rta rkang gsum la chibs pa
NK037(ji)015:95: rlung nag 'tshubs ma'i dbus na gnas shing ma mo
NK037(ji)015:97: ma mo'i mdun du b+h+yo las bshan pa srog sgrub nag mo rngams shing khros pa /
NK037(ji)015:98: g.yas chu gri rnon po phyar zhing g.yon dgra bo'i glong snying za ba /
NK037(ji)015:99: mi lpags kyi gos dang thod rus sbrul gyis brgyan cing srid pa'i rlung nag zhon pa /
NK037(ji)015:100: g.yas na lce spyang gdong ma /
NK037(ji)015:102: mdun na 'ug gdong ma sogs sha za dang ma mo 'bum sdes bskor ba /
NK037(ji)015:103: ma mo'i g.yas su tri las gza' bdud r+aa hu
NK037(ji)015:104: la smug nag mgo bo dgu pa phyag bzhi'i dang
NK037(ji)015:105: po gnyis chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang sbrul zhags
NK037(ji)015:106: / 'og ma gnyis mda' gzhus dgra snying gzir ba /
NK037(ji)015:107: lus kun mig gis gang zhing ro smad sbrul du 'khyil ba /
NK037(ji)015:108: dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas can gza' dang gdong mo
NK037(ji)015:109: rgyu skar sogs 'jigs byed dregs pa'i tshogs kyis bskor
NK037(ji)015:110: ba / ma mo'i rgyab tu k+sha las gnod sbyin bshan pa dmar nag zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa /
NK037(ji)015:111: g.yas gnyis gri gug dang ral gri /
NK037(ji)015:112: g.yon gnyis thod pa dang sbrul zhags 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)015:113: dar dmar gyi ber dang dur khrod kyi chas can mkha' lding la zhon pa /
NK037(ji)015:114: las byed pho nya sde brgyad sogs sha za bshan pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)015:115: ma mo'i g.yon du tri las skyes mchog rdo rje
NK037(ji)015:116: legs pa dmar po phyag g.yas rdo rjes dgra mgo
NK037(ji)015:117: gzir zhing g.yon mi snying 'dzin pa /
NK037(ji)015:118: dar dkar gyi ber dang brjid pa'i chas can ra skyes kham pa la zhon pa /
NK037(ji)015:119: 'khor ging chen sde bzhi lha btsan bdud kyi dge
NK037(ji)015:120: bsnyen sum brgya drug cu dgyes sde mo bcu gnyis
NK037(ji)015:121: za byed mche ba can sogs dregs pa'i tshogs kyis
NK037(ji)015:122: bskor ba / gzhan yang phyi'i 'khor yug la ye
NK037(ji)015:123: shes dang las las grub pa'i dregs pa pho rgyud
NK037(ji)015:124: mo rgyud pho nya las byed bsam gyis mi khyab
NK037(ji)015:126: thams cad kyang 'jigs shing rngams pa'i gzugs 'chang zhing /
NK037(ji)015:127: phrin las 'dod rgur bsgyur bas sgrub pa po'i re
NK037(ji)015:128: 'dod yid bzhin du skong ba'i tshul gyis gnas pa'o
NK037(ji)015:131: h'u las 'od zer 'phros pas chos dbyings yum gyi mkha' /
NK037(ji)015:133: ri rab kyi rtse dur khrod chen po brgyad sogs
NK037(ji)015:134: grub pa'i gnas yul dgyes par spyod pa'i zhing thams
NK037(ji)015:135: cad nas ye shes kyi ma mo 'khor dang bcas
NK037(ji)015:136: pa badz+ra sa m+aa dzahs spyan drangs par bsam zhing
NK037(ji)015:137: / b+h+yoh bde chen kun bzang yum gyi mkha' //
NK037(ji)015:138: rang byung ye shes spros bral dbyings //
NK037(ji)015:139: dmigs med chos sku'i dkyil 'khor nas //
NK037(ji)015:140: thugs rjes sprul pa'i skur bzhengs ma //
NK037(ji)015:141: mkha' 'gro kun gyi gtso mo che //
NK037(ji)015:142: srid gsum dbang sgyur ral gcig ma //
NK037(ji)015:143: gsang sngags bka' srung sgrol ba'i yum //
NK037(ji)015:144: smug nag khros ma gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)015:145: dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis //
NK037(ji)015:146: tshur gshegs tshur gshegs ma gcig kye //
NK037(ji)015:147: ming po rdo rjes deng 'bod kyis //
NK037(ji)015:148: sring mo dam can da tshur byon //
NK037(ji)015:150: u tsa la yi du khrod nas //
NK037(ji)015:151: legs ldan nag po gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)015:153: 'dod khams bdag mo gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)015:155: dur khrod gnas nas mkha' 'gro ma //
NK037(ji)015:156: mi bsrun bshan pa gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)015:157: bar snang khams nas 'jigs byed gtso //
NK037(ji)015:158: khyab 'jug chen po he chen brdal nas sgrol ba'i ging //
NK037(ji)015:159: gnod sbyin chen po dam tshig gnas nas thig le rtsal //
NK037(ji)015:160: rdo rje legs pa bstan pa skyong ba'i dam can rnams //
NK037(ji)015:161: so so'i mngag gzhug pho nyar bcas //
NK037(ji)015:163: phrin las sgrub phyir gshegs su gsol //
NK037(ji)015:164: ro ru e ka ts+aa ti snying khar rak+mo ru
NK037(ji)015:165: lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u dzahdzahtraga rak+sha sa pa
NK037(ji)015:166: ri w+aa ra e h+ye hi badz+ra sa m+aa dzahdzahmh'u
NK037(ji)015:169: chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs pa ni //
NK037(ji)015:170: smug nag khros ma rag gdong ma //
NK037(ji)015:171: sngags kyi srung ma 'khor dang bcas //
NK037(ji)015:173: trag rak+sha sa pa ri w+aa ra sa ma ya tish+tha lhan //
NK037(ji)015:176: dpal ldan ye shes mkha' 'gro'i gtso //
NK037(ji)015:177: sngags srung ma mo ral gcig ma //
NK037(ji)015:178: mthu chen dregs pa chen po'i tshogs //
NK037(ji)015:180: a ti p+au hoh pra t+aits+tsha hoh zhes pas phyag bya /
NK037(ji)015:182: rab 'byams zhing kun gang ba'i mchod pa'i sprin //
NK037(ji)015:183: me tog phreng mdzes bdug spos sprin phung g.yo //
NK037(ji)015:184: 'od 'bar snang gsal dri chab lbu phreng bzhad //
NK037(ji)015:185: ro brgya'i zhal zas snyan brjid rol mo 'khrol //
NK037(ji)015:186: sha rus don snying nang rol sna tshogs dang //
NK037(ji)015:187: rmad byung bdud rtsi rak+ta btung ba'i mtsho //
NK037(ji)015:188: 'dod yon bza' baca'i gtor ma bsam mi khyab //
NK037(ji)015:189: gzugs mdzes sgra snyan dri zhim ro bda' dang //
NK037(ji)015:190: reg 'jam lha mi'i mchod sprin ji snyed kyis //
NK037(ji)015:191: mchod do dgyes par rol la phrin las mdzod //
NK037(ji)015:192: trag rak+sha sa pa ri w+aa ra push+pe nas shap+da'i bar dang /
NK037(ji)015:193: a mri ta rak+ta ba lim ta pany+tsa k+aa ma gu na pra t+aits+tsha s+w+aa h+aa /
NK037(ji)015:196: b+h+yoh bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i dur khrod nas //
NK037(ji)015:197: shin tu gsod pa'i smug nag khros ma ni //
NK037(ji)015:198: nam mkha'i lus can lho srin gos su gyon //
NK037(ji)015:199: tsit+ta za zhing dam nyams snying khrag 'dren //
NK037(ji)015:200: zhing chung dbyug pas dgra snying tshal par 'gems //
NK037(ji)015:201: 'jigs byed chen mo ral pa'i thor tshugs can //
NK037(ji)015:202: dpral bar mig gcig srid gsum khungs nas 'byin //
NK037(ji)015:203: zhal na tshems gcig dgra bo'i srog gcod ma //
NK037(ji)015:204: brang na nu gcig sgrub mchog bu bzhin skyong //
NK037(ji)015:205: sha khrag longs spyod dmar gtor 'di bzhes la //
NK037(ji)015:206: dam tshig dbang gis dam nyams gshed ma mdzod //
NK037(ji)015:207: ma mo srog la 'gyed phyir 'di gsol la //
NK037(ji)015:208: bdag gis bcol ba'i phrin las sgrub par mdzod //
NK037(ji)015:209: dam tshig dus la bab bo sa ma ya //
NK037(ji)015:212: dpal ldan gtso mo e ka dz+aa ti ma //
NK037(ji)015:213: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ru lu'i sgra skad sgrog /
NK037(ji)015:214: kun tu bzang mo dbyings kyi ma mo'i mchog /
NK037(ji)015:215: las dang ye shes tshogs kyi rje la bstod //
NK037(ji)015:217: dpal ldan mgon po mi pham srid gsum bdag /
NK037(ji)015:218: legs ldan nag po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jigs //
NK037(ji)015:219: che ba'i yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
NK037(ji)015:220: ma h+aa k+aa la 'khor dang bcas la bstod //
NK037(ji)015:221: b+h+yoh shin tu mi bsrun bdud mo re ma t+ai //
NK037(ji)015:222: mun pa'i mdog can drel rta rkang gsum chibs //
NK037(ji)015:223: stong khams nyul zhing skye 'gro'i srog dbugs len //
NK037(ji)015:224: bstan pa srung mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal bstod //
NK037(ji)015:225: b+h+yoh bshan pa nag mo mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol //
NK037(ji)015:226: phyag na snying dang nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams //
NK037(ji)015:227: las byed mkha' 'gro bye ba'i 'khor gyis bskor //
NK037(ji)015:228: nam gru nag mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs la bstod //
NK037(ji)015:230: drang srong chen po gza' mchog r+aa hu la //
NK037(ji)015:231: sku mdog dud kha dbu dgu spyan stong 'bar //
NK037(ji)015:232: phyag bzhi mda' gzhu ral gri rgyal mtshan bsnams //
NK037(ji)015:233: sring bzhi sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas la bstod //
NK037(ji)015:235: gnod sbyin dmar nag zangs kyi khyung dmar chibs //
NK037(ji)015:236: zhal gcig phyag bzhi gri gug thod khrag dang //
NK037(ji)015:237: ral gri dgra snying sbrul nag zhags pa bsnams //
NK037(ji)015:238: drag gtum chen po 'khor dang bcas la bstod //
NK037(ji)015:240: dam can chen po dmar nag thig le rtsal //
NK037(ji)015:241: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dgra snying bsnams //
NK037(ji)015:242: thod phreng g.yang gzhi stag gi sham thabs can //
NK037(ji)015:243: mched 'khor sum brgya drug cur bcas la bstod //
NK037(ji)015:245: sngon tshe rdo rje 'chang gi spyan snga ru //
NK037(ji)015:246: khas blangs dam bcas srung ma'i tshogs rnams dang //
NK037(ji)015:247: bod yul gter bdag brtan ma bcu gnyis dang //
NK037(ji)015:248: yul lha gzhi bdag 'khor dang bcas la bstod //
NK037(ji)015:250: spro na khros ma gsang rgyud las 'byung ba'i ma
NK037(ji)015:251: mo'i rtags bstod dang sde lnga'i sgos bstod sogs kyang
NK037(ji)015:252: ci shes bya ba yin no //
NK037(ji)015:254: ma mo 'khor bcas kyi thugs kar nyi ma la
NK037(ji)015:255: gnas pa'i so so'i srog yig gi mthar rang sngags
NK037(ji)015:256: kyis bskor ba / bdag gi thugs ka'i 'od kyis
NK037(ji)015:257: bskul bas ci 'dod pa'i phrin las rab 'byams thogs
NK037(ji)015:258: med du sgrub par bsam la /
NK037(ji)015:259: ma ma e ka dz+aa ti trag rak+sha snying kha rak+mo ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u /
NK037(ji)015:261: ma h+aa k+aa la trak+shada ma h+aa k+aa la sid+d+hi tri yam du dzahdzah zhes mgon po dang /
NK037(ji)015:262: traka rak+sha re ma t+ai ru lu ru lu b+h+yo dzahmh'u /
NK037(ji)015:266: snying kha kha bam ya ma sod tsa bam bi
NK037(ji)015:267: ni mu sod g+ha ya sod n+ri ya sod rak+mo
NK037(ji)015:268: nir rbud / ces srog sgrub ma'o //
NK037(ji)015:269: hri shag ru ram n+aa ge tsit+ta tram ma ma
NK037(ji)015:270: yong za 'gram ha he yo ge sha la dzahdzah
NK037(ji)015:272: e he ma ru tse gu na hri tri g+h+ram
NK037(ji)015:273: b+h+yo sha ram b+h+yo su ra dza d+h+ai ka ha
NK037(ji)015:274: la g+ha na tsa ya dzahdzah zhes gnod sbyin dang
NK037(ji)015:275: / badz+ra s+aa d+hu sa ma ya has bya hus
NK037(ji)015:276: bya gle gad e b+hag sha ya dzah zhes dam
NK037(ji)015:277: can gyi sngags te gtso 'khor gyi 'gros sbyar ba
NK037(ji)015:278: ci nus bzlas pa'i mthar mchod bstod kyang bya zhing
NK037(ji)015:279: / / tshogs mchod skong bshams sogs byed na'ang skabs 'di nyid du bya ba yin la /
NK037(ji)015:280: thun gyi mthar gtor ma bstab pa dang /
NK037(ji)015:282: gshegs bsdu smon lam shis brjod rnams bya'o //
NK037(ji)015:283: gsum pa dbang gi cho ga ni /
NK037(ji)015:284: bdag mdun gyi sgrub mchod gong du bshad pa bzhin byas la /
NK037(ji)015:285: slob ma'i bya ba khrus dang phyag bya /
NK037(ji)015:286: bgegs gtor bsngo ba rnams sngon du 'gro bas /
NK037(ji)015:287: mtshams sbyor ci rigs pa las /
NK037(ji)015:288: khyad par 'dir gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa spyi dang /
NK037(ji)015:289: bye brag gsang chen a ti yo ga'i bstan srung kun gyi gtso bo /
NK037(ji)015:290: bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang mo nyid gdug pa
NK037(ji)015:291: can 'dul ba dang rang gi bstan pa bsrung phyir
NK037(ji)015:292: ye shes kyi ma mo'i skur bzhengs pa e ka
NK037(ji)015:293: dz+aa ti ste / ral gcig ma'am sngags srung chen
NK037(ji)015:294: mo rdo rje rag gdong mar grags pa 'di nyid
NK037(ji)015:295: dz+aa ti ste / / gtso bor khros ma gsang ba'i rgyud dang /
NK037(ji)015:296: gzhan yang a ti dang ma h+aa yo ga'i rgyud du ma nas bstan cing /
NK037(ji)015:297: de la yi dam ltar sgrub pa dang /
NK037(ji)015:298: chos skyong ltar sgrub tshul ji snyed cig yod pa las /
NK037(ji)015:299: 'dir chos skyong ltar sgrub pa yin /
NK037(ji)015:300: de la yang ma mo rang rkyang du sgrub pa dang /
NK037(ji)015:301: dregs pa gzhan gyi 'khor can du sgrub pa gnyis las /
NK037(ji)015:302: phyi ma ltar sgrub pa ste man ngag snying thig
NK037(ji)015:303: chen mo'i bla ma brgyud pa'i bka' srol las byung
NK037(ji)015:304: ba / chos rje kun mkhyen chen po'i phyag bzhes
NK037(ji)015:305: bzhin sgrub ba la slob dpon gyi bya ba rnams
NK037(ji)015:306: ba / sngon du song / slob ma'i bya ba man+dala phul /
NK037(ji)015:307: gsol ba 'debs pa e ma slob dpon dgongs su gsol //
NK037(ji)015:308: bdag ni bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
NK037(ji)015:309: bde bar gshegs pas bka' bsgos pa //
NK037(ji)015:310: dregs pa mthu yi dbang bskur zhu //
NK037(ji)015:313: tshur shog skal ldan rigs kyi bu //
NK037(ji)015:314: bstan pa bsrung bar dgongs pa legs //
NK037(ji)015:315: drag sngags mthu yi dbang bskur gyi //
NK037(ji)015:316: sangs rgyas bstan pa thub par srungs //
NK037(ji)015:318: yan lag bdun pa tshigs bcad gang rung gi sgo nas tshogs bsags /
NK037(ji)015:320: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
NK037(ji)015:321: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
NK037(ji)015:322: dam tshig bsrung na dngos grub thob //
NK037(ji)015:323: 'da' dka' rdo rje'i dam srungs shig /
NK037(ji)015:324: sa ma ya a mri ta h'u /
NK037(ji)015:326: slob dpon dang slob ma bdag bskyed gang yin gyi lhar gsal ba las /
NK037(ji)015:327: mdun na yod pa'i gtor ma rnams dur khrod chen
NK037(ji)015:328: po'i dbus su pad+ma dang nyi ma dgra bgegs kyi
NK037(ji)015:329: gdan la dpal ye shes kyi ma mo sngags kyi
NK037(ji)015:330: srung ma e ka dz+aa ti /
NK037(ji)015:331: byang shar du bdud mgon legs ldan nag po lcam dral /
NK037(ji)015:332: shar du bshan pa srog sgrub nag mo /
NK037(ji)015:333: lhor gza' bdud chen po r+aa hu la /
NK037(ji)015:334: nub tu gnod sbyin bshan pa dmar nag /
NK037(ji)015:335: byang du dam can rdo rje legs pa rnams so so'i 'khor dang bcas pa /
NK037(ji)015:336: gzhan yang ye shes dang las la grub pa'i dregs
NK037(ji)015:337: pa pho rgyud mo rgyud pho nya las byed bsam
NK037(ji)015:338: gyis mi khyab pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba /
NK037(ji)015:339: thams cad kyang sku gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa'i dgyes nyams dang ldan pa /
NK037(ji)015:340: gsung h'u dang b+h+yo'i sngags sgra 'brug ltar sgrog pa /
NK037(ji)015:341: thugs bde gsal gyi ngang las bstan pa skyong ba'i
NK037(ji)015:342: phrin las la dgyes bzhin mngon sum du bzhugs snyam
NK037(ji)015:343: du mos 'tshal / de nas slob dpon la mos
NK037(ji)015:344: gus dung ba zhig byas pas de'i thugs ka nas
NK037(ji)015:345: du mos 'tshal / 'od zer byung / mdun bskyed
NK037(ji)015:346: ma mo'i thugs rgyud bskul bas de'i gnas gsum las
NK037(ji)015:347: 'od zer dkar dmar mthing ga dpag tu med pa
NK037(ji)015:348: 'phros khyed rang gi gnas gsum du thim par gyur
NK037(ji)015:349: snyam par mos shig byas la /
NK037(ji)015:350: gtor ma spyi bor bzhag ste /
NK037(ji)015:352: dpal ldan gtso mo e ka dz+aa ti ma //
NK037(ji)015:353: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ru lu'i sgra skad sgrog /
NK037(ji)015:354: kun tu bzang mo dbyings kyi ma mo mchog /
NK037(ji)015:355: las dang ye shes tshogs kyi rje mo yis //
NK037(ji)015:356: skal ldan rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:357: sngags srung 'grub phyir mthu dbang thob pa dang //
NK037(ji)015:358: phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis 'grub par shog /
NK037(ji)015:359: ma ma e dz+aa ti trag rak+sha snying kha rak+mo
NK037(ji)015:360: ru lu ru lu h'u b+h+yo h'u k+aa ya a
NK037(ji)015:361: b+hi shiny+tsa h'u / w+aa ka a b+hi shiny+tsa +aah tsit+ta a b+hi shiny+tsa h'u /
NK037(ji)015:362: zhes sngags dang bstun te gnas gsum so sor bzhag pas /
NK037(ji)015:363: ma mo'i sku gsung thugs dang slob ma'i lus ngag yid gsum dbyer med du gyur /
NK037(ji)015:364: ma mo'i mthu dbang thob ste bsgo ba nyan cing
NK037(ji)015:365: lus dang grib ma bzhin dbyer med du gyur par
NK037(ji)015:366: bsam / des sku'i rjes gnang grub bo //
NK037(ji)015:368: slob dpon slob ma mdun bskyed dang bcas pa'i thugs
NK037(ji)015:369: kar pad nyi la so so'i sa bon rang sngags
NK037(ji)015:371: de nas mos gus byas pas bla ma'i zhal nas sngags phreng byung ba slob ma'i khar zhugs /
NK037(ji)015:372: lus kyi dbyibs brgyud gsang gnas nas thon /
NK037(ji)015:373: ma mo'i mkhar zhugs zhal nas thon /
NK037(ji)015:374: slob dpon gyi gsang gnas nas zhugs 'gal me ltar
NK037(ji)015:375: 'khor ba'i 'od zer slob ma'i sngags phreng dang sa
NK037(ji)015:376: bon la thim pas ma mo'i sngags kyi dngos grub
NK037(ji)015:377: thob nas las byed par bsam la rjes zlos mdzod
NK037(ji)015:378: cig byas la / ma ma e ka dz+aa ti sogs lan gsum rjes zlos byas nas /
NK037(ji)015:379: slob dpon la me tog 'thor zhing 'di'i rjes zlos mdzod /
NK037(ji)015:380: sngags srung bdag la stsal lags kyi //
NK037(ji)015:381: bdag la 'go bar mdzad du gsol //
NK037(ji)015:382: zhes lan gsum gsol ba gdab /
NK037(ji)015:383: slob dpon gyis me tog slob ma'i mgo bor bzhag la /
NK037(ji)015:384: sngags srung 'di la stsal lags kyi //
NK037(ji)015:387: des gsung gi rjes gnang grub pa lags /
NK037(ji)015:389: mdun gyi ma mo me long la has btab pa bzhin 'od du zhu nas khyed rang la thim /
NK037(ji)015:390: de yang 'od du zhu nas nam mkha' la 'ja'
NK037(ji)015:391: yal ba ltar spros pa thams cad dang bral ba
NK037(ji)015:392: stong pa nyid kyi ngang la mnyam par zhog mdzod
NK037(ji)015:393: / 'di ni gnad gal po che ste srung ma
NK037(ji)015:394: dang dbyer med du byas pas 'khu ldog mi 'byung
NK037(ji)015:396: des thugs kyi rjes gnang grub ces brjod /
NK037(ji)015:397: tshul de lta bus rigs 'gre bas /
NK037(ji)015:398: legs ldan gyi gtor mas dbang bskur te /
NK037(ji)015:400: dpal ldan mgon po mi pham srid gsum bdag /
NK037(ji)015:401: legs ldan nag po grong khyer sum brtsegs 'jig /
NK037(ji)015:402: che ba'i yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam //
NK037(ji)015:403: ma h+aa k+aa la 'khor dang bcas pa yis //
NK037(ji)015:404: skal ldan rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:405: mgon po 'grub phyir mthu dbang thob pa dang //
NK037(ji)015:406: phrin las rnam bzhi lhun gyis 'grub par shog /
NK037(ji)015:407: ma h+aa k+aa la trag shad sid+d+hi tri yam du
NK037(ji)015:408: dzahdzah k+aa ya a b+hi w+aa ka a b+hi tsit+ta
NK037(ji)015:409: a b+hi dregs pa pho rgyud bzhi la sngags phreng
NK037(ji)015:410: zhal nas lte bar 'khor brgyud byed pa las gzhan
NK037(ji)015:412: lha bstims nas 'od gsal du bsdu /
NK037(ji)015:413: re ma t+ai'i gtor mas dbang bskur te /
NK037(ji)015:414: b+h+yoh shin tu mi bsrun bdud mo re ma t+ai //
NK037(ji)015:415: mun pa'i mdog can drel rta rkang gsum chibs //
NK037(ji)015:416: stong khams nyul zhing skye 'gro'i srog dbugs len //
NK037(ji)015:417: bstan pa srung mdzad 'khor dang bcas pa yis //
NK037(ji)015:418: skal ldan rigs kyi bu la ma mo 'grub phyir
NK037(ji)015:419: mthu phrin las rnam bzhi trag rak+sha re ma t+ai
NK037(ji)015:420: ru lu ru lu b+h+yo dzahmh'u k+aa ya w+aa ka
NK037(ji)015:423: srog sgrub ma'i gtor mas dbang bskur te /
NK037(ji)015:424: b+h+yoh bshan pa nag mo mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol //
NK037(ji)015:425: phyag na snying dang nad kyi rkyal pa bsnams //
NK037(ji)015:426: las byed mkha' 'gro bye pa'i 'khor gyis bskor //
NK037(ji)015:427: nam gru nag mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs bcas kyis //
NK037(ji)015:428: skal ldan srog sgrub 'grub phyir phrin las rnam bzhi khyi kha le nag mo sod /
NK037(ji)015:430: snying kha kha bam ya ma sod /
NK037(ji)015:431: tsa bam bi ti mu sod /
NK037(ji)015:435: k+aa ya w+aa ka tsit+ta a b+hi dmigs pa snga ma lta bus bzlas lung byin /
NK037(ji)015:436: mdun gyi lha bstims nas 'od gsal du bsdu /
NK037(ji)015:437: khyab 'jug gi gtor mas dbang bskur te /
NK037(ji)015:439: drang srong chen po gza' mchog r+aa hu la //
NK037(ji)015:440: sku mdog dud kha dbu dgu spyan stong 'bar //
NK037(ji)015:441: phyag bzhi mda' gzhu ral gri rgyal mtshan bsnams //
NK037(ji)015:442: sring bzhi sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa yis //
NK037(ji)015:443: skal ldan gza' mchog phrin las hri shag ru ram
NK037(ji)015:444: n+aa ge tsit+ta tram ma ma yo za 'gram ha
NK037(ji)015:445: he yo gi sha la dzahdzahk+aa ya a b+hi w+aa
NK037(ji)015:448: gnod sbyin gyi gtor mas dbang bskur te /
NK037(ji)015:450: gnod sbyin dmar nag zangs kyi khyung dmar chibs //
NK037(ji)015:451: zhal gcig phyag bzhi gri gug thod khrag dang //
NK037(ji)015:452: ral gri dgra snying sbrul nag zhags pa bsnams //
NK037(ji)015:453: drag gtum chen po 'khor dang bcas pa yis //
NK037(ji)015:454: skal ldan gnod sbyin phrin las e he ma ru
NK037(ji)015:455: tse gu na hri tri g+h+ram b+h+yo sha ram b+hi
NK037(ji)015:456: su ra dzahd+h+ri ka ha la g+ha na tsa ya
NK037(ji)015:457: dzahdzah k+aa ya w+aa ka tsit+ta zhes dbang bskur /
NK037(ji)015:460: dam can gyi gtor mas dbang bskur te /
NK037(ji)015:462: dam can chen po dmar nag thig le rtsal //
NK037(ji)015:463: zhal gcig phyag gnyis rdo rje dgra snying bsnams //
NK037(ji)015:464: thod phreng g.yang gzhi stag gi sham thabs can //
NK037(ji)015:465: mched 'khor sum brgya drug cur bcas rnams kyis //
NK037(ji)015:466: skal ldan dam can phrin las rnams bzhi lhun gyis 'grub par shog /
NK037(ji)015:467: badz+ra s+aa d+hu sa ma ya has bya hus bya
NK037(ji)015:468: gle gad e b+hag sha ya dzah dzah k+aa ya
NK037(ji)015:469: w+aa ka tsit+ta zhes dbang bskur /
NK037(ji)015:471: 'od gsal du bsdu ba rnams bya'o //
NK037(ji)015:472: de nas dam rdzas rnams kyi dbang bskur te /
NK037(ji)015:475: yang dag gsang ba'i thod pa 'di //
NK037(ji)015:476: sde brgyad pho brang gnas kyi rten //
NK037(ji)015:478: sde brgyad las la 'gyed par shog /
NK037(ji)015:479: ka p+aa la a b+hi shiny+tsa m+aam /
NK037(ji)015:482: bshos bu bzhi brtsegs mar me lnga //
NK037(ji)015:483: srid pa gsum dang ldan pa yi //
NK037(ji)015:484: ri rab lhun po'i dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:485: dam can srung ma mnyes byed shog /
NK037(ji)015:487: rten gyi ri rab gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:489: gling chen bzhi dang ri rab bcas pa yi //
NK037(ji)015:490: sku rten 'di yi dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:491: dam can srung ma ma lus pa //
NK037(ji)015:493: rat+na man+da la a b+hi ba dan gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:495: ba dan sna tshogs sku yi rgyan //
NK037(ji)015:496: dar lce mang po pu ru ru //
NK037(ji)015:497: mdzes pa' rgyan 'dis dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:498: yang dag rgyan dang ldan par shog /
NK037(ji)015:499: pa tam ka a b+hi rgyal mtshan gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:501: rgyal mtshan sna tshogs kun gyis mdzes //
NK037(ji)015:502: mnga' thang longs spyod ldan pa yis //
NK037(ji)015:503: rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:504: bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par shog /
NK037(ji)015:505: d+h+aa dza a b+hi snying phreng gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:507: rang rang mthun pa'i dam rdzas ni //
NK037(ji)015:508: sems can sna tshogs snying sna ste //
NK037(ji)015:509: rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:511: tsit+ta m+aa la a b+hi mchod gtor gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:513: drag po'i mchod gtor dam rdzas 'dis //
NK037(ji)015:514: rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:515: bka' srung dam can ma lus pa //
NK037(ji)015:516: bu la 'du ba'i dbang thob shog /
NK037(ji)015:517: ma h+aa ba ling+ta thun rdzas gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:519: gdug pa sna tshogs sbyar ba'i rdzas //
NK037(ji)015:520: mngags pa'i pho nya mtshon dpal 'dis //
NK037(ji)015:521: rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:522: drag po'i las rnam 'grub par shog /
NK037(ji)015:523: m+aa ra ya a b+hi rak+ta gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:526: gsod pa'i mtshon cha ma mo'i nad //
NK037(ji)015:527: rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:528: drag sngags dmod pa 'grub par shog /
NK037(ji)015:529: ma h+aa rak+ta a b+hi yungs dkar gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:531: yungs kar rgyal po drang srong mda' //
NK037(ji)015:532: mngags pa'i pho nya gsod pa'i rdzas //
NK037(ji)015:533: mtshon dang gdug pa'i dpal 'di yis //
NK037(ji)015:534: las rnams ma lus 'grub par shog /
NK037(ji)015:535: sha r+ai ram a b+hi phur pa gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:537: gnag pa thun gyi phur pa 'di //
NK037(ji)015:538: mngags pa'i pho nya mtshon cha'i dbal //
NK037(ji)015:539: rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:540: dgra bgegs ma lus sgrol bar shog /
NK037(ji)015:541: k+ai la ya a b+hi ral gri gtad la /
NK037(ji)015:543: skye shi rtsad nas gcod pa yi //
NK037(ji)015:545: rigs kyi bu la dbang bskur bas //
NK037(ji)015:546: dgra bgegs srog rtsa gcod par shog /
NK037(ji)015:548: zhes rim pa bzhin gtad do //
NK037(ji)015:549: dam rdzas b+han+d+ha nas bzung mchod gtor gtod pa yan chad yon tan gyi rjes gnang ngo //
NK037(ji)015:550: thun rdzas gtod pa phyin chad phrin las kyi rjes gnang du 'gyur bas /
NK037(ji)015:551: thun rdzas gtod pa'i gong du ling+ga la dmigs bya
NK037(ji)015:552: bstim nas thun rdzas rnams slob ma la gtad rim
NK037(ji)015:553: bzhin btab na dmigs phyed cing don dang 'brel bar
NK037(ji)015:554: 'gyur zhing / dam rdzas gtod tshig rnams kun mkhyen
NK037(ji)015:555: nyid kyis kyang bde 'dus dregs pa'i mthu dbang la
NK037(ji)015:556: brten par snang bas de bzhin du dag par byas
NK037(ji)015:557: 'gyur zhing / so // skabs 'dir gtor ma'i bka' bsgo bya ba lag len la snang bas /
NK037(ji)015:558: gang gi rten gtor rnams snod cig tu bsdus pa
NK037(ji)015:559: so so'i skur sngar bzhin gsal btab pa slob ma'i
NK037(ji)015:561: gtor ma 'di dag dpal ye shes kyi ma mo
NK037(ji)015:562: sngags kyi srung ma dam can sde bdun lcam dral
NK037(ji)015:563: bka' sdod 'khor dang bcas par gsal ba'i steng gi
NK037(ji)015:564: cha la rtsa brgyud kyi bla ma sangs rgyas byang
NK037(ji)015:565: sems dang bcas pa sprin gtibs pa bzhin du bzhugs
NK037(ji)015:566: par mos mdzod / so so'i sngags rnams brjod pa'i mthar /
NK037(ji)015:567: dpal ye shes kyi ma mo sngags srung smug nag khros ma'i rgyal mo /
NK037(ji)015:568: bdud mgon legs ldan nag po lcam dral /
NK037(ji)015:569: bshan pa srog sgrub nag mo /
NK037(ji)015:570: drang srong gza' bdud chen po /
NK037(ji)015:571: gnod sbyin bshan pa dmar nag /
NK037(ji)015:572: dam can rdo rje legs pa rnams so so'i 'khor
NK037(ji)015:573: g.yog pho nya las mkhan dang bcas pa rnams kyis
NK037(ji)015:575: rdo rje sems dpa' sogs bla ma brgyud pa rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod la /
NK037(ji)015:576: de rnams kyi bka' dang dam las ma 'da' bar
NK037(ji)015:577: rdo rje'i slob ma 'di rnams la sku gsung thugs
NK037(ji)015:578: yon tan phrin las kyi sgo nas dbang dang dngos
NK037(ji)015:580: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba la nus mthu dang ldan par mdzad du gsol /
NK037(ji)015:581: 'di'i srung ma chen mo mdzad nas /
NK037(ji)015:582: lus dang grib ma bzhin 'grogs te /
NK037(ji)015:584: mthun rkyen sgrubs sogs bka' bsgo ci rigs pa bya /
NK037(ji)015:585: mthar bla ma yi dam rnams ma mo 'khor bcas la thim /
NK037(ji)015:586: de rnams 'od du zhu nas slob ma la thim pa dpon slob gnyis car gis bsgom /
NK037(ji)015:587: rjes dam tshig bsgrag cing khas blang ba dang /
NK037(ji)015:588: yon 'bul ba sogs rjes kyi bya ba spyi dang 'dra'o //
NK037(ji)015:589: cho ga'i mjug gi bya ba gtor 'bul /
NK037(ji)015:590: gtang rag bzod gsol gshegs bsdu smon lam shis brjod rnams kyang gong bzhin bya'o //
NK037(ji)015:591: de dag ni sde bdun du sgrub pa'i tshul lo //
NK037(ji)015:592: sde lnga'i sgrub thabs ltar byed na /
NK037(ji)015:593: mgon po dang re ma t+ai gnyis kyi gtor ma'i
NK037(ji)015:594: bsham dang 'dod sgom gyi tshig rnams bor la gzhan
NK037(ji)015:596: kun mkhyen nyid kyis sgrub thabs so sor mdzad pa yod kyang /
NK037(ji)015:597: brten gzhi'i khungs dang lha'i ngo bo cho ga'i khrigs rnams phal cher mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
NK037(ji)015:598: 'di'i sngags srung ma ni gsang sngags spyi'i srung mar
NK037(ji)015:599: ma zad khyad par rgyud dang sgrub thabs man ngag
NK037(ji)015:600: thams cad snying thig chen mo dang 'brel chags su
NK037(ji)015:601: byung bas de'i bka' srung gi gtso bo yin cing
NK037(ji)015:602: / legs ldan lcam dral kyang zhwa'i mgon po gri
NK037(ji)015:603: thod can du grags pa nyid yin pas 'dir 'brel
NK037(ji)015:604: / chags shing / slob dpon pad mas mdzad pa'i
NK037(ji)015:605: sgrub thabs zhwa lha khang nas spyi lha dga' rab
NK037(ji)015:606: kyis bton te gnyos lo la stsal ba des sngar
NK037(ji)015:607: ba ling +aa tsar+ya las thob pa dang gnad gcig
NK037(ji)015:608: par dgongs nas bka' gter gcig tu dril nas nyams
NK037(ji)015:609: / chags shing / len mdzad cing / mngon rtogs
NK037(ji)015:610: kyang 'dir g.yas kyi zhags pa'i dod du gri gug
NK037(ji)015:611: / chags shing / len mdzad cing / dang /
NK037(ji)015:612: g.yon pa'i khram shing gi gnas su zhags pa 'dzin
NK037(ji)015:613: / chags shing / len mdzad cing / dang /
NK037(ji)015:614: cing / shwa na'i zhal med pa tsam las gzhan
NK037(ji)015:615: thams cad khyad par med cing /
NK037(ji)015:616: re ma t+ai yang gnyos lugs spyir btang la phyag
NK037(ji)015:617: bzhi mar byed kyang skabs 'gar phyag gnyis ma dang
NK037(ji)015:618: 'dam kha can du 'byung bas 'di dang phal cher
NK037(ji)015:619: mthun no // srog sgrub ma ni mkha' 'gro snying thig sgos kyi srung ma dang /
NK037(ji)015:620: gza' bdud dang gnod sbyin kyang gter kha de dang
NK037(ji)015:621: 'brel chags su byon cing rdo rje theg pa'i bstan
NK037(ji)015:622: srung 'gran med du grub pa dang /
NK037(ji)015:623: dam can ni snying thig gi gter srung khyad par ba yin cing /
NK037(ji)015:624: slob dpon pad+ma dang nyang ban chen pos mdzad pa'i
NK037(ji)015:625: sgrub thabs chos bka' 'di dang 'brel chags su byung
NK037(ji)015:626: zhing / 'dir bstan gtso 'khor sdebs sgrub kyi tshul
NK037(ji)015:627: ni bla ma brgyud pa'i byin rlabs kyi bka' srol
NK037(ji)015:629: khyad par chos rje kun mkhyen chen po nyid kyis
NK037(ji)015:630: zhal gzigs shing de dang mthun pa'i sgrub thabs dngos
NK037(ji)015:632: dpag bsam ljon shing zhes bya ba gnyis mdzad /
NK037(ji)015:633: de yang so so'i rgyud dang sgrub thabs man ngag
NK037(ji)015:634: gi gces gnad gsang ba zab mo dang 'brel ba'i
NK037(ji)015:635: phyir mthu nus byin rlabs kyi tshan kha gzhan las
NK037(ji)015:636: khyad par du gyur pa yin no //
NK037(ji)015:637: mi 'gyur chos nyid dbyer med kyang //
NK037(ji)015:638: rdo rje snying po'i bka' srung du //
NK037(ji)015:639: rnam 'gyur tha dad sde bdun gyi //
NK037(ji)015:640: sgrub thabs zab mo'i gnad 'dus lags //
NK037(ji)015:641: dpal ldan sngags kyi srung ma sde bdun dang sde
NK037(ji)015:642: lnga'i sgrub thabs dbang dang bcas pa'i le'u tshan gter
NK037(ji)015:643: chen 'gyur med rdo rje'i gsung sgrub thabs 'dod 'jo'i
